message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration of its unique features and benefits, I am offering this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $999999. This is a limited-time offer, designed to provide you with unparalleled value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with the purchase.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. However, my budget is set at $1200000 maximum for this product. Would it be possible for us to negotiate closer to this amount?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose we finalize the deal at $1150000. This is a special offer tailored for you considering the value this product brings. Please let me know if this suits your needs.
